Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE
AMEND BY RESTORING TO ORIGINAL PRINT 31
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Exempts certain personal protective clothing, outdoor food dining equipment and equipment purchased by small businesses from the tax on sales and the compensating use tax
Summary: Exempts certain personal protective clothing and equipment from the tax on sales and the compensating use tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting certain personal protective clothing and equipment from the tax on sales and the compensating use tax
